Title: Enacts the regional broadband expansion and access program act; repealer
Summary: Enacts the regional broadband expansion and access program act; relates to the cost of expanding broadband access.
LawCode: Add Art 12 §§241 - 245, Pub Serv L; rpld §10 sub 24-e, Hway L; rpld §7, Transp Corps L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to enacting the "regional broadband expansion and access program act"; and to repeal subdivision 24-e of section 10 of the highway law and section 7 of the transportation corporations law, in relation to the cost of expanding broadband access
